content: I know some of my contacts get deadnamed by the voter file and I feel like there must be some way I can tell the Democratic data that in reach like I can tell them the corret phone number?
<@663410272110772226> - I have also wondered about this, so following and I will also research.
When they change their name on their voter registration it should show up correctly in Reach. https://www.usa.gov/change-voter-registration

<@568257600228032512> Correct, but just to clarify, if they have not legally changed their name yet, is there anyway to note it in Reach, even if it does not change the official name, like a highlighted notes section.  If not, hope they add it.
In Reach you can select the person, tap the three dots and Add Nickname or Edit Name.
Does that then share the info with the Democrats?
It is inside Reach. Dems would see if they are capturing info from Reach. You should ask the campaign if they are doing that. https://kamalaharris.com/contact-us/
